tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive customer profile information including current communication preferences, contact details, and account status.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

include_history.description: Whether to include historical preference changes

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system. Verify the customer ID is correct.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to view this customer profile. Ensure proper authorization.
Invalid customer_id format: Customer ID must be a non-empty string.
usage: Provide a valid customer_id to retrieve their profile. Set include_history to true if you need historical preference data.

current_preferences.description: List of current communication preference settings
